content: Create a paragraph using only words that start with the letter "t".

In the tranquil town, Timothy tirelessly tended to his tomato terrace. Towering trees tossed their twigs, tickling Timothy's tan toes. Tired but thrilled, he tip-toed towards his tiny timber tavern, where tasty treats tantalized his taste buds. Today was undoubtedly triumphant; tomorrow promised more tussles, but for now, Timothy triumphed over toil, thanking the universe for this terrific turn of events.
